title: Web Journal
subTitle: A personal blogging platform powered by Sanity CMS — built to prioritize writing and content creation over site maintenance.

title: Flix Stream
subTitle: A streamlined video-sharing platform inspired by YouTube — upload videos, manage your channel and subscribe to other creators.

title: The Sharkk Co.
subTitle: A full-scale e-commerce application built with Next.js, MongoDB and Node.js — featuring user accounts, product listings and automated email notifications via brevo.

title: Project Management - The Sharkk Co.
subTitle: A dedicated product management dashboard for the main Sharkk Co. e-commerce platform — built with Next.js to streamline product creation, updates and inventory control.

title: Anonymous University
subTitle: A Learning Management System where students can access study materials, participate in discussions and collaborate via community-style forums.
